reviews.review:
This was the first proper single player shooter I ever played as I did not grow up playing them. I played it for the first time a few years and ago and it was my gateway to loving linear, single player fps games. I found the environments and the simple story incredibly immersive. The combat, especially on hard, requires you to plan ahead for each encounter. The entire arsenal you have access to is useful. The soundtrack is minimal but memorable when it appears. The enemy AI is actually really fun to go up against as you learn their quirks. 
I feel this 20 year old game holds up extremely well. The graphics are dated, but they have a charm and simplicity to them that keeps them a bit fresh. Honestly, I think you are missing out if you haven't played this.
Half life é um dos fps mais importantes ja feitos, e um jogo muito renomado. Mesmo sendo um jogo antigo ele continua divertido, com uma ótima trama, uma boa gameplay e um certo nível de dificuldade
juego epico

[h1]Dust Up[/h1]

[u]Half-Life[/u] is a game that created a world and encapsulated story within it, unlike anything else at the time. It still holds up today - remarkably well, along with it's successor. This game is a mountain in creative endeavour and a journey of timeless proportion. Game play elements largely range around FPS combat, of which there are numerous weapons and consequent strategies to employ. It makes for enjoyable variation and persistent novelty combined with the changing level environments and enemy encounters. Speaking of changing environments, the game takes place at a research facility called Black Mesa and your ventures will take place here. The atmosphere that both the visuals, ambience, and music evokes help to enhance the experience and memorability. Perhaps it's also important that the game flows without any cut-scenes with the only gaps being load times between areas. That is probably one of the most notable praises and for good reason, it succinctly keeps the immersive qualities of the game within a consistent state and thus allows the player to stay in a flow with the game and the elements that make it so great to begin with. Overall, the experience can be described as brilliantly potent and immersive.

The music also adds a lot to the overall atmosphere. For the most part, the game remains on ambience and an assortment of sound effects to fill the noise but sometimes the soundtrack kicks in and it's incredibly potent. Ranging from dark ambient soundscapes that envelope the world, as well as harder industrial and techno tracks for the more pumped up moments of combat. The whole OST fits the environment - hazardous and isolating atmosphere of Black Mesa.

Класс проходил с другом в Sven Co-op(фанатская модификация на кооператив, которая доступна в стиме бесплатно) до 12 главы. А потом отрубили сервера Sven Co-op и он умер(я про Sven Co-op, не друга)
В игре классный сюжет, но рассказать его не могу ибо спойлеры.
Графика очень устаревшая, но можно скачать ремейк от фанатов под названием Black Mesa(фанатский ремейк который доступен в стиме). 
Оружия ощущаются плохо, кроме дробовика и гаусс-пушки, они хорошо ощущаются. 
Геймплей по сути как Call of Duty, но иногда то дают на поезде покататся, то тентаклей уничтожить, то Гаргантюа уничтожить и т.д.
Кому не зашла новая КАЛ оф дьюти, то попробуйте Half-life, она намного лучше

HALF-LIFE ES UN JUEGO DE DISPAROS EN PRIMERA PERSONA DESARROLLADO POR VALVE QUE SE PUBLICO EL 8 DE NOVIEMBRE DE 1998  PARA MI HALF-LIFE TIENE UNA HISTORIA BUENA PERO  NO TANTA PARA SER LA HISTORA TAN PROFUNDA PERO ESTA BIEN EN JUGABILIDAD: SE CONTROLA BIEN RESPETANDO LA  JUGABILIDAD  DE LOS JUEGOS DE DISPAROS DE  ESTE ESTILO GRAFICOS: PARA LA EPOCA ESTAN BIEN Y CONSIGEN UN BUEN GRADO DE DETALLE Y CREO QUE TAMBIEN ES INPRESIONANTE PARA LA EPOCA  EN FIN  UN BUEN JUEGO  PARA LA EPOCA Y TAMBIEN PARA ESTOS TIEMPOS

güzel

very fun. definitely deserves the hype, even as a 23-year old game.
edit: ok, this game is not perfect. though the level design is great, and the combat hasn't aged a day, it IS a goldsource game. at one point near the beginning there was a vent I had to break and crawl through; note that you have to stand on vents AND crouch to break them. I tried breaking it, didn't work, guess there's another way. I was on a wild goose chase for that alternate enterance for fifteen f*** minutes trying to find it. Don't get me wrong, I love this game, but nonlinear games as a whole need to be playtested pretty damn well to make sure everything is layed out clearly. that's not to say this game has awful level design, everything is well-done with the resources given to valve and for a game that was made in an age where pc games consisted of "point, click on bad guy, press w key to progress." if you don't mind clipping into and getting stuck on textures, having to manually save so you don't loose 15 minutes of progress, and an ugly 3rd act, there is GOLD here. (hence gold source)

tl:dr old game feels old but not that old considering how old it is. 10/10

I purchased this game as a part of the Valve complete pack back in 2014. I have completed the game in the past on other hardware, but my lastest build can not run this game properly. Many instance errors occurring from a desync in load times and render times lead to ai bugging out constantly, ques not happening, and makes this game all around incomplete. It feels like playing a shitty half like mod, but it's the actual game. The source remake is not any better, and I soft locked on that remaster before opting to play the original because I thought I could at least complete my run. I was wrong. Bummed!

Не могу никак решить эту проблему и продолжить играть,ибо эта су*а не ходит по комнате,а стоит на месте

Klasyk klasyków, król wśród gier, gra która zrewolucjonizowała gry i ułożyła podwaliny pod inne gry studia Valve, jak i ogólnie większości gier na świecie. Rozbudowana i ciekawa fabuła. Wcielamy się w Gordona Freemana, fizyka teoretycznego pracującego w laboratorium Black Mesa, gdzie dochodzi do kaskady rezonansowej i ataku kosmitów. Fabuła pozostawia wiele pytań, zachęcając do szperania po necie w poszukiwaniu odpowiedzi. Przyjemność strzelania jak na grę z 1998 jest ogromna, grafika może i kuleje ale wiek gry mówi sam za siebie, więc nie ma co wypominać dziadkowi zmarszczek. Zagadki logiczne, nie za trudne nie za łatwe, trochę segmentów ze skakaniem i całe mnóstwo strzelania.
Gra ma dużo obiektów które można zniszczyć, co na pewno spodoba się fanom rozwalania wszystkiego dookoła. Do tego nawet jak przejdziemy grę, to internet oferuje nam mnóstwo modów, które tworzone są po dziś dzień. Polecam tego klasyka każdemu, jest wart zagrania i tych kilku złotych, bo dostarcza niezapomniane doświadczenia, mimo swojego wieku.
